Namespace ForumWebApi.Models

Classes

Comment

Represents a comment in a forum.

Post

Represents a post in a forum.

PostCategory

Represents a category that a post can be assigned to.

ServiceResponse<T>

Represents a response from a service operation, which can contain data of type T and a message.

User

Represents a user in the system.

Vote

Represents a vote for a post by a user.

Represents the possible states that a post can be in.
